material.mattext: Only _____ pallet is to be lifted at one time
What is the colour code for drill ammunition?
Prohibited articles in explosive area are _______ .
When you encounter unidentifiable objects in live-firing area, what should you do?
Pick the object up and inspect it since you have sufficient knowledge on ammunition
Leave your object alone and report to your commander
Bring the object to your commander
Detonation is a violent chemical reaction evolving heat and ____ pressure.
What is the colour code for armour defeating ammunition?
A _____ gallon drum of water is to be provided for the ESH storing WP ammo.
In case of a WP burn, immerse wound in _____ to remove the phosphorous.
WP stored in the ESH can be 3 tiers high and must strictly comply with the _____ pallet rule.
A _____ is to be stationed near a WP ESH for taking out the affected pallet when required.
Pyrotechnic composition in contact with the skin will cause _____.
Pyrotechnics are capable of creating explosions in certain situations, such as rapid burning in a confined environment - a phenomenon known as _____.
If there is a WP leakage, the affected pallet must be retrieved by the _____ pallet.
_____ ammunition must never be forcibly removed from the weapon.
Which of the following is a correct precaution to be observed when handling a forklift?
Drive the forklift with care and an assistant is needed to help with the unloading of ammunition.
An assistant is not needed to unload ammunition if you're a 3SG and above
An assistant is not needed to unload ammunition if you're a 2SG and above
An assistant is not needed to unload ammunition if you're a 1SG and above
_____ explosives have the inherent ability to cause sudden propagation of destructive shockwave energy.
A misfired round still appears even though its _____ has been struck by the weapon''''s firing pin.
For hand smoke grenade, the smoke colour is represented by the_____ symbol.
What is the colour code for practice ammunition?
Gassing involves the generation of _____ gas as a result of chemical reaction between the filling and its inherent moisture content.
For ESH not fitted with a _____ protection system, personnel working inside must be evacuated during thunderstorms.
Most modern propellant explosives are capable of confined combustion without the presence of atmospheric ______ and experience deflagration when ignited.
_____ is to be applied before and after contact with pyrotechnic compositions.
Anti-static precautions such as earthing of the bench and the wearing of _____ must be observed.
Ammunition containers are to be opened in the _____ .
Ammunition in which the propelling agent or initiating device has failed to function are called _____ .
_____ is an explosive item which has been fired but remain unexploded on impact due to a malfunction.
____ ammunition are meant to be used as training aids.
Explosives are mainly classified into how many main classes?
Which of the following correctly describes the fundamental principle of safety when handling explosives?
Greater care is needed for transportation than storage
Greatest care is needed at all times
Greater care is needed for inspection than storage
Greater care is needed for disposal than storage
The _____ golden rules of ammunition safety provide a basic set of rules for soldiers to follow when handling ammunition and explosives.
A detonation process occurs at velocity in excess of _____ m/s.
What is the colour code for incendiary ammunition?
